mapper.select: select m_id, m_face_img, m_grade, m_item_id, m_job, m_name, m_number, m_skill, m_status, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, deleted, version from team01.javeee_member where m_id = #{mId}

select m_id, m_face_img, m_grade, m_item_id, m_job, m_name, m_number, m_skill, m_status, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, deleted, version from team01.javeee_member limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into team01.javeee_member(m_face_img, m_grade, m_item_id, m_job, m_name, m_number, m_skill, m_status, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, deleted, version) values (#{mFaceImg}, #{mGrade}, #{mItemId}, #{mJob}, #{mName}, #{mNumber}, #{mSkill}, #{mStatus}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser}, #{deleted}, #{version})
mapper.update:
update team01.javeee_member
m_face_img = #{mFaceImg},
m_grade = #{mGrade},
m_item_id = #{mItemId},
m_job = #{mJob},
m_name = #{mName},
m_number = #{mNumber},
m_skill = #{mSkill},
m_status = #{mStatus},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_user = #{createUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_user = #{updateUser},
deleted = #{deleted},
version = #{version},
where m_id = #{mId}
